table.name: crm_validation
table.comment: Stores core info about an extended (custom) property. Input form-related info is kept separately (in contact_form_field), so a property may be 'presented' in multiple form fields.

field.name: type
field.values: Email, Money, URL, Phone, Positive Integer, Variable Name, Range, Regular Expression Match, Regular Expression No Match
field.comment: List of rule built-in rule types. custom types may be added to ENUM via directory scan.

field.name: parameters
field.comment: optional value(s) passed to validation function, e.g. a regular expression, min and max for Range, operator + number for Comparison type, etc.

field.name: function_name
field.comment: custom validation function name. Class methods should be invoked using php syntax array(CLASS_NAME, FN_NAME)
